Jackie Johnston

Currently lives and works in Pasadena, Calif.
www.jackiejohnston.com

Art Classes

  • 2011 Fall Qtr.Painting I (Art 2151) taught by Tracy Petre, Columbia Basin College, Pasco, Wash.
  • 2016 Fall Qtr.Plein Air Painting (ACN-114W) taught by Robert Sherrill, Art Center at Night, Pasadena, Calif.

Exhibits & Awards

  • 2016Spirits of the Night Gold Medal Exhibit with other California Art League members. Juried by Ellen Brown, San Fernando Valley Arts & Cultural Center, Tarzana, Calif. (Juried group exhibit.) Won Merchandise Award for Big Top Swinger.
  • 2016Passion!: Women's City Club of Pasadena Exhibit. Blinn House, Pasadena, Calif. (Curated invitational group exhibit.)
  • 2016Plein Air at the Fair with other California Art Club members. Millard Sheets Art Center, Pomona, Calif. (Non-curated invitational group exhibit.) Won Audience Favorite award for Big Top Swinger.
  • 2016Flight & Flow with other California Art League members. Juried by Victor Picou, San Fernando Valley Arts & Cultural Center, Tarzana, Calif. (Juried group exhibit.) Won Best of Show award for Port Angeles.
  • 2015Gold Medal Exhibit with other California Art League members. Juried by Daggi Wallace, San Fernando Valley Arts & Cultural Center, Tarzana, Calif. (Juried group exhibit.)
  • 2015SeaScapes. Juried by Mallory Whitfield, Light Space & Time (Online juried group exhibit.) Won 6th place overall and 4th place in the painting category awards for Beach Walker.
  • 2015Made in the USA Collection. Curated by Jessica McQueen, Saatchi Art (Online curated group invitational exhibit.)
  • 2012Juried Student Art Show with other Columbia Basin College art students. Curated by Mary Dryburgh, Esvelt Art Gallery, Pasco, Wash. (Curated invitational group exhibit.) Won Community Award and Purchase Award for Attempted Murder of Crows.

Collections

  • Esvelt Art Gallery, Columbia Basin College, Pasco, Wash.

Affiliations

  • 2015-PresentExhibiting Member & Board Member, California Art League, Tarzana, Calif.
  • 2015-PresentAssociate Artist, California Art Club, Pasadena, Calif.
  • 2015-2016Artist Member, Los Angeles Art Association, Los Angeles, Calif.
